20110126010158.000|20110126010159.000|CC1|>>> IT BEGAN WITH POLICE TRYING 
20110126010159.000|20110126010202.000|CC1|TO PULL OVER A DRIVER FOR A     
20110126010202.000|20110126010202.000|CC1|ROUTINE TRAFFIC VIOLATION.

20110126010205.000|20110126010208.000|CC1|THROUGH THE SAN GABRIEL VALLEY  
20110126010208.000|20110126010208.000|CC1|THAT CAME TO A VIOLENT ENDING,  
20110126010208.000|20110126010209.000|CC1|AND SOME RESIDENTS BELIEVE IT   
20110126010209.000|20110126010211.000|CC1|COULD HAVE BEEN AVOIDED.

20110126010233.000|20110126010238.000|CC1|SPOTTED EDGAR ENGARITA AT THEIR

20110126010427.000|20110126010429.000|CC1|>>> FORMER ORANGE COUNTY SHERIFF
20110126010429.000|20110126010431.000|CC1|MIKE CORONA SURRENDERED AT A    
20110126010431.000|20110126010433.000|CC1|FEDERAL PRISON IN COLORADO.     
20110126010433.000|20110126010434.000|CC1|HE WILL BEGIN SERVING HIS       
20110126010434.000|20110126010436.000|CC1|5 1/2-YEAR TERM FOR WITNESS     
20110126010436.000|20110126010436.000|CC1|TAMPERING.                      
20110126010436.000|20110126010438.000|CC1|THE 55-YEAR-OLD CORONA WAS      
20110126010438.000|20110126010440.000|CC1|ORANGE COUNTY'S TOP COP FOR NINE
20110126010440.000|20110126010442.000|CC1|YEARS BEFORE HE WAS INDICTED AND

20110126010443.000|20110126010445.000|CC1|A FORMER TOP AIDE TO LIE FOR    
20110126010445.000|20110126010446.000|CC1|HIM.

20110126010448.000|20110126010449.000|CC1|INVESTIGATION FOR CORRUPTION.

20110126010450.000|20110126010452.000|CC1|REMAIN FREE WHILE HIS APPEAL WAS
20110126010452.000|20110126010454.000|CC1|PENDING, BUT A PANEL OF THE

20110126010455.000|20110126010456.000|CC1|THE APPEAL HAD NO MERIT.
